评论详情: Omg! FABULOUS Everything about this is fabulous! I'm in love with these. Comfortable and super attractive. The lace is a very beautiful crochet lace....The softness is beyond compare. I bought the red one and the green one. The colors are vibrant. The size spot on. The material is lightweight and cool. It's not stretchy, it's just pure soft cotton. The slash pockets on both sides are a nice addition. I can carry my cell phone and my tissues and even my remote in them. The mother of pearl buttons are nicely done and securely sewn on. I like the extra ruffle at the bottom of the skirt. It has a really nice full sweep. The length is perfect. I'm 5 ft 3 and it comes down to about 2 inches above my ankle. It's just a perfect comfortable soft nightgown that's very feminine. I bought two and I will be buying four more.

I purchased this nightgown to sleep in while visiting family. I can't stand to be hot at night, but wanted something that won't leave me feeling exposed if seen walking down the hall to the bathroom! This is perfect on both accounts. The fabric is cool and lightweight but not at all see-though. The cut is generous and flowy, long enough (mid-calf), and covers up top. I'm planning to order another one or two in different colors. Very comfortable!

评论概述: Cotton breathable, slightly stretchy, extremely comfortable
评论详情: I cannot stand the garments that are partially made of that nasty spandex fabric.  This nightgown is cotton with a slight bit of stretch so as to make it very comfortable and easy to wear, kind of like a tee shirt, especially while sleeping.  It might have some spandex in it, but if so, it's a very small percentage.  This is cottony and comfortable, not slaggy and clingy.  It washes beautifully.  I always hang this up to dry rather than put through the dryer, though.  The pattern is adorable.  The buttons are real with real buttonholes.  The buttons have no bearing on how to put on or take off, so I just leave them buttoned.

This house dress is perfect for lounging in the house.  It is dressy enough to have people over.I material is soft and not too heavy.  This is made of polyester and cotton so it’s not as cool as 100% percent cotton.  The print is lovely and you normally don’t find house dresses in this print.  One added plus is this nightgown/house dress has pockets on each side.  You do not know how much I searched to find nightgowns with pockets.I waited to post this video to see how it looked after I washed it.  It looks great.  Was washed in washing machine and dryer.  One note to keep in mind is you want to press it after you wash because it will have a lot of wrinkles.But the material looks like it’s worth it and the price was affordable.

Purchased for my mother. She was delighted with the softness of the fabric and the non-scratchy lace trim. The length is good and the pockets are important for a 92 year old to keep her phone handy. It washed well and the fabric is prettier than it looks in the photos. A true white with delicate flowers. Would buy again.

This is really pretty and comfortable! The fabric isn’t 100% cotton, however, there is some polyester , I think 35%, but, it is still soft and breathable and beautiful for sleeping. Packs up small for traveling!

评论概述: Really cuter then I expect quality issue.
评论详情: I was surprizing pleased with this purchase when it arrived.  It seemed well made and really cute.  Much different then the name brand poly nightgowns I was used to but I really liked it.  Yes, are pits could be a tad bigger but not tight or uncomfortable.  I bought medium and I'm on the smaller side of medium.  The fit otherwise is perfect.I have worn this off and on for four weeks and cool water washed it probably three times.  I hang it up to dry for fear of pits shrinking.  Now I notice one seams at the pit is coming unstitched as shown in photo.  My return window is still open so it's going back.  But...I like it enough that I will try it one more time if the price goes down because it's since gone up.There you have it!  I suggest it is worth trying but check all your seams when you get it.

I loved the material, style and pretty design.  It was longer than I expected. I’m 5’3’ and it almost touches the floor. That might be a consideration. The style helps to camouflage your bust if you prefer the modest coverage. I do love the gown.

I absolutely love these! I got the red one and white floral but traded the white for the grey as it was see through. I bought them for pregnancy as nothing else feels good. However i did follow wash instructions and they did shrink which really sucks.  Length shrinkage i can deal with but the arm pit hole is now way too tight making it uncomfy.  I would recommend air dry or just tumble dry with no heat
Very soft and comfortable. My advice is to hand dry. One of mine shrunk after a tumble dry on medium heat.
Beautuful, soft and the perfect roominess.  Love the pleats!

评论概述: Really nice. Buy larger size for shrinkage
评论详情: Really nice nightgown, soft and cool fabric and flattering design. Just remember to buy a larger size to allow for shrinkage, that's all.
Beautiful gown, and comfortable. I love it.
The fabric is soft and washes nicely with little to no wrinkling. The style is also very pretty.

Very nice nightgown for the price. I’m breastfeeding and this nightgown works well to do just that with the ease of the buttons in the front. Love that it has pockets, and the material is breathable and lightweight but not see through.  It’s like your grandma’s nightgown but upgraded and better. Already bought another one in another pattern!

I ordered 4 of these nightdress because Amazon had them on a lightening sale. I liked the length of these dresses and also the colors/prints. They fit well. They even have pockets, although they could be a bit lower so you can use them comfortably. The material seems to be a cotton with a touch of polyester. Overall, a good buy.

评论概述: My Daughter loves her gown to have baby in
评论详情: Comfy,soft,and keeps cool
It’s silky soft and hangs beautifully. Washes well, dries quickly, resists wrinkles and the pockets are an added bonus. Quite honestly, it’s the best nightgown I’ve ever owned. Ten stars.
Hope it fits. It's pretty

I love this gown. It's so pretty and comfortable. I laze around in gowns on weekends a lot,I work Mon.-Fri. So I love finding comfy pretty stuff to lounge around in.The material is exactly what I look for,not that weird feeling polyester.
Feels soft. I wasn’t sure when I purchased this for my post open heart surgery, but it was absolutely the right choice. Lots of room to move without garment pressure,  oh so comfortable.
Love love and love!! Fits true to size

There's definite confusion on the fabrication of this item.  The headline touts it as being cotton, but the item description says "65% polyester / 35% cotton".  I was skeptical, as I really prefer 100% cotton for summertime sleepwear, but I ordered one of the colorways to give it a try.Once it arrived, I was further confused because there isn't a fabric content label inside at all.  Furthermore, it doesn't feel like cotton or poly/cotton at all - it feels like rayon.  After washing, I still think it's either rayon, or a rayon blend.  There was some shrinkage, but minor.  The material does seem to get a bit softer with each washing, which would suggest either cotton or rayon.On the "flattering" equation - my husband told me that it reminded him of an old fashioned muumuu, and he didn't mean that as a compliment.  He's pretty reserved about criticizing anything that I wear, ever.  It's the length that he especially didn't care for.  I, too, would prefer a shorter hem length.  Should this manufacturer decide to discontinue this SKU and modernize this style of nightgown, I'd recommend finding a true 100% cotton fabric, and making it to about knee-length, or just above the knee.
It is so soft and comfy, I Love it. It's material is on the thin side good value I'm going to order another one and the fit you may want to get a size or two larger
So comfortable and easy to wash. Sizing is perfect. Love the colors and patterns. I have 5 now.
The fit was perfect.  The fabric is very soft and comfy.  I love the length.  What I paid for it was worth every penny.  I'll will purchase again.  Thank you.
I am very pleased with my purchase. It’s beautiful and comfortable. I will be purchasing more.

评论概述: Material is a little thinner that I would have liked
评论详情: Cute with lots of details
Nice fabric and pretty cotton lace.  Well constructed.  Great purchase.
I like the style , I wish the fabric is a little softer .

评论概述: Just what I've been looking fot!
评论详情: This nightgown is perfect! Soft lightweight material that falls attractively due to many small tucks. Mid calf length. Flattering.  I ordered 2 other nightgowns of similar style and sent them back. I was delighted to finally find what I was looking for in this gown.  I got the turquoise floral gown. I wish they would add a country blue with white flower option as well as a baby pink with white flower option.

This is really a nice nightgown. I would only wear it for that. But i bought a large, not expecting much really, but I was surprised.  It fit me perfectly and its so light, it is great for summer.  summer is almost over but it will come again.  I bought a few more.  I am going to have them shortened though.  I don't like my nightgowns super long.  I don't like ruffles.  But I love the top. Its easy to get into, you don't even have to unbutton the buttons.  and there is nothing around your neck, which I like.  And its sleeveless too, which is great for summer.  It does have pockets, although I don't think I really need them, but some might.  Anyway, this is a really neat nightgown.  I hope the rest of them fit like this one does.And they are not expensive either.
Love the length of the gown & the material  would buy again

评论概述: Just perfect nightgown!!!  Exactly what I wanted!!!

So soft, love the pockets as well

The corn blue color is beautiful and not see through. . . Lounge around all you want. It fits me comfortably... I always buy one size larger. Try it, I think you'll love it ... Color is outstanding; makes me happy.
I really like this night gown!!  But I sure wish I had ordered one size smaller because it runs very large.
Cotton blend very nice
I ordered several of these nightgowns because they were light weight but not see through with pockets. Easy wash and dry.

I'm 5 ft 103 lbs. I ordered amedium it fits a bit big but I'm trying to put on a few healthy pounds so, the looseness doesn't bother me. I Live in the desert, It's very comfortable and cool. It feels like cotton.  Came very wrinkled but no chemical smell. My only negative response would be the price. I think $28.00 is a bit overpriced.  If I were to see this nightgown on sale at a more lower price I would definitely buy more.
I like the fabric and the pockets!
I love these! I have 6 now! the pockets are high and that’s why I didn’t give it a 5 star

评论概述: More like a long sundress than a comfy nightgown.
评论详情: This garment is more of a long sundress than a nightgown because the material is like something used in dresses, not nightgowns.  That’s fine if you want a sundress.  I however wanted a comfy nightgown. I will keep this “dress” while continuing to look elsewhere for a soft cotton knit nightgown.
I like everything about this nightgown.  It’s well made and washes/dries well.  It’s in the same style as more expensive Eileen West nightgowns. Great buy!
It said cotton nightgowns but it is 65 polyester and only 35%  cotton. Probably my fault for not making sure I read what it says under fabric. But they did say cotton nightgown
Fabric is nice, length is what I wanted but the cut is not so good. The bottom should flare wider than the waist but instead is reduced, so the gown does not hang in a flattering shape.
The material of this item is so soft. It is also light weight so very comfortable. Decent value for the money
Comfortable. Washes well . It isn’t cotton but I like it well enough

When I opened the package, the material of this nightgown felt like rayon to me.  When I washed it before wearing it, the wet nightgown felt like cotton.  When the nightgown was dry it felt like rayon again.  Overall, I find the nightgown to be comfortable when wearing it.  Keep in mind that this is not a knit material, so it doesn't have that give to it.
I like longer nightgowns. Very comfortable not too hot.

评论用户: Absolutely love it , so comfortable wish I had someone to share it with

Lighting and comfortable

Pretty nightgown and almost nice enough to wear out (teamed with a sweater).  Have another one in different material that wouldn't do that with LOL.  Comfortable and soft material makes wearing pleasant experience.

I ordered one for my sister and one for myself to wear on our Fall's Sister's Trip. They arrived very quickly and well-packaged. The first thing I noticed was the exceptionally soft, flowy fabric. The floral design colors were a soft Autumn palette of ochre, burnt orange, and sage green on a creamy white background. They were perfect for the still warm October weather, but with the color flair of Fall! Love everything about them. I'll be recommending and returning to 'AVIIER' time and again! Kudos 'AVIIER'!
This gown/housedress is very comfortable, very soft and flowy, very well made. The color and print of the material is very pretty. I would recommend and would buy again.

The fabric is thin but. This gown is so comfortable. I am a short big girl. So as we all know. If it fits your top it doesn't fit your bottom. Or, if it fits your bottom it will not fit your top. Not this gown. It fits me perfectly! It's not too long and the top fits perfectly. The only thing I would like this; Wish that the fabric was a bit thicker.

So soft, love the pretty flower pattern. I have washed in cold water then right into the dryer multiple times and it comes through beautifully. Comfort is top notch and nice and cool.  Would have given 5 stars except a little spendy and I don’t like the pockets. Not big enough to be practical and a bit annoying.

I liked the dress but  I shouldn’t have ordered a an extra large because I’m only 5ft tall. I’ll be more careful & read all the measurements before ordering any more clothes. I cut off the bottom ruffle & my neighbor is hemming it for me.
Right price, right fit, right color! Very comfortable!

评论概述: Love the softness and surprise! It has pockets!
评论详情: Not see-through!  Gown is very comfortable overall but the lace around neckline is a little scratchy. Hoping it will improve after another washing. I washed mine in cold water and dried on a medium heat. No shrinkage.

评论概述: Everything I was looking for in a nightgown!
评论详情: I purchase the black with the white flowers and when I received it I immediately loved the pattern, much better in person than in the one pictured in the ad. This gown is 35% Cotton & 65% Polyester. After reading a majority of the very mixed reviews, I decided to go my own way. I am full in the bust area (38ddd) with a smaller waist area and fuller buttocks (pant12-14 depending on brand). I’m 180lbs, 5’6”, I ordered the XL and it was plenty roomy, even after washing in cold water and drying on normal heat.  Pros: Super soft fabric, longer length, no shrinkage (none that I noticed), roomy fit, but most importantly for me “POCKETS”!  Cons: The black fabric did bleed even though I washed in cold water. Item was not shipped in a mailing envelope or box.  Overall I am happy with this nightgown and have purchased the white flower one in a Largeinstead of an XL.
This runs small
I was wondering about this after reading some negative reviews but I went ahead and bought mine and I am happy I did. I love it!  I will buy more.
Once the seller sent me the correct size (the first time it was not right), I loved this nightie.
This is so comfortable and I love it so much I am ordering another.  But just be careful washing.  It is not color fast.  It does fade on first wash.
the fabric is soft, but the lace is itchy.

I really liked everything about it.  The material is light and soft;  great for a hot Florida night.  However, I returned it because the Medium was too big, and so I ordered two more in size Small.  I’m 5’6” and weigh125 and normally wear Size 10 (Medium).
I been buying much more expensive all cotton gowns but no more this is the most comfortable I’ve bought the arm holes are not too tight . I will define buy more . I’m 5’5 170lbs 40 DD

I enjoy the generous fit and nice fabric. My only complaint is the lace on straps and bottice scratch/itch. Hoping that the lace softens up after more washings. The gown is nice and cool for my Florida home.

This gown is pretty (I got the blue and green watercolor).  Love the pockets and comfort.  I am giving it 4 stars because it’s rather big on me.  Amazon’s recommendation for me was large, although I thought I needed a medium, and I was right.  I will keep this large but will order a medium in the future (I do plan to buy another of this gown).

sooooooooo comfy, I ordered 2 more and one for my daughter, I want nothing else to sleep in, perfect material, light weight yet not so light that it doesn't keep you warm.  Bonus: Love the pockets.  I want them all!

I’ve ordered these before and find after a few washings that the arm holes shrink. I bought a size up to help with that. I wish they would come with the buttons done as it’s very hard to put them through the holes. This time my gown was missing 2 buttons. I like the weight, length and design.
Nice gown.  Very comfortable.  Washes well and keeps  color.

I love this nightgown. It is light, non see through, woven fabric. I wash it on delicate and hang it to dry. I have purchased 3. This one though is starting to pill on the inside. And it is pilling strangely, from the bottom up. This nightgown is approximately 3-4 months old. The other two are perfect.
Very pretty design but it measured 5 inches longer than my total height!  Unfortunately, the gown must be returned.

This nightgown is the most feminine I have ever owned, and I love, beautiful nightgowns. It is covered with Roses And has a bit of  lace and a few buttons as well. When I washed it, it did not need to be ironed, which was an unexpected bonus. If you love roses and lace and romantic nightgowns, this is for you.
Not sure I would buy another. Does not seem well made or durable.

This nightgown is so comfortable to wear. It is light and airy and is cool to wear on hot nights. I am going to be purchasing more of them. I am 5ft3 and weigh 222 lbs and I bough a xxl and it is really big. So I will be purchasing other ones but in a smaller size.  I highly recommend. Good quality, great materials.
Very cool to wear in the hot weather

This is a much nicer gown than I expected. The fabric is soft and cool for summer nights. I am 5'6" and around 160lbs, and ordered a large but think a medium would probably be a little better fit. It washes well, and I can throw it in the drier without shrinking, which is great because who wants to fuss with sleepwear! It might be slightly shorter after drying the first time, but not enough to be an issue. The lace trim stays looking nice through washes, too. The color looks true to the photos, a very soft grey-blue. A good purchase!

I’ve been wearing nightgowns my entire (long) life. And I have to say, this gown rivals my very expensive nightgowns.  These days I don’t feel right spending almost a $100 or even $50 to get a nice comfortable gown. I bought the ”white flowers” with a little bit of a sale which helped greatly too. As far as fit goes, I’m 5’ tall and it’s a few inches above the top of my feet, which I’m used to. And one thing to note is I have already washed it once in cold water and hung to dry as I do the rest of my nightgowns and it washed up fine. The fabric has just enough weight to it so it drapes nicely without the “ballooning” effect which I’m not fond of.  And I don’t think it will be a problem holding in heat during the warmer months of summer. So far I’ve slept really good in it.  And to top it off this night gown has pockets!  I didn’t know I needed them in my sleepwear but I do now!  I recommend you give this gown a try, I think you will be pleased.

评论概述: The sleeveless design provides ample freedom of movement, ensuring a comfortable night's sleep
评论详情: I recently purchased the AVIIER Cotton Nightgown for Women and it has quickly become my favorite piece of sleepwear.  The sleeveless design provides ample freedom of movement, ensuring a comfortable night's sleep.  The soft cotton fabric feels incredibly gentle against the skin, making it perfect for those with sensitive skin like mine.  The thoughtful addition of pockets is a game-changer, allowing me to keep my essentials close at hand whether I'm lounging around the house or getting ready for bed.  The length of the nightdress is just right, offering enough coverage without feeling restrictive. Overall, I highly recommend the AVIIER Cotton Nightgown for its quality, comfort, and practicality.
I am very pleased with this nightgown.  It washes nicely and drier great.  It fits well.  Very pleased with it.
I like really oversized so i wish it came in bigger sizes but, its really soft on and the lace doesnt itch at all, recommend

I like this gown but it arrived missing 4 front buttons. Luckily, I have lots of small buttons at home and know how to sew thus I was able to replace those which were missing.  I like the color, style and material. It washes beautifully and dried wrinkle free on a hanger.

I took a chance and ordered a S which is usually too large, but it fits fine. 5'4''  95 lbs.  The print is cute, but I should have returned it. There is extra fabric across the chest area.  Not that it's too large, just a strange amount of extra fabric that pops out over the button area in front.  And the lace along the neckline is scratchy--for me--someone else with less sensitive skins will not notice it.  But it was distracting during the night.  So it will become more of a lounging type of garment.
Soft and comfortable.  Runs large. I bought my usual size, but could have easily sized down, I suspect with plenty of room to spare. Lots of fabric.  I’m 5’1”, and the length comes to my ankles.
It's made well, has pockets and is very roomy and comfortable. Would prefer 100% cotton.

The nightgown is comfortable and soft. It flows nicely and doesn't cling to my body. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star review is because the buttons are so little that it took me 30 minutes to button them all.
The material was very soft and comfortable.
Washes like a dream, no ironing. Comfortable fit, pretty,  But,  the lace never softens with wear and it is extremely uncomfortable touching the skin.
I like nightgowns and have a difficult time finding one that suites me, is comfortable and appealing. This gown Is so comfortable, fabric is soft and good value for the money. Highly recommend!
Just the right weight !
I will order more.
Perfect fit ,material feels buttery soft , love love love it
Am 5ft 3in, 160 lb, 38B and medium fits nice.  Armholes not too long and print is camouflaging.  Came back for a second one.
Love gowns. These are so light and comfortable. Lots of fabric so no binding. No wrinkles. Colors and patterns are so pretty. Pockets are great. Have 3 now. Highly recommend.

I wanted a lightweight gown to wear around the house in the hot summer and this works except its kinda heavy, the fabric that is, so I just cut it off at the knees and now its good to go. I got large because I have athletic build and so my shoulders are bigger and so I needed room.
I loved the print and it's comfortable and breathable, looks pretty good wearing it.  The only thing is that the buttons going down the front are very breakable.
